review: Four stars is based solely on the recommendation of the instructions manual to have the unit plugged into a normal power outlet and not the USB port on the TV. I mounted my TV on the wall and routed all of the cables through the wall. I'm not going to route this USB power cable through the wall too. It has functioned sufficiently connected to my 2009 Sony Bravia. I may have missed an Wi-Fi downloadable update or something...I've had an issue once or twice where it wouldn't find my Wi-Fi network. To correct I would unplug it and the USB power from the TV, wait 30 seconds, and plug it in again for everything to work out fine.
author: A. Neiman

review: I have had this for one and a half days and I already feel this was money well spent.  For streaming content online, whether movies, television show, or music videos - this is the easiest by far. We've watched all of the above as well as live baseball games, listened to streaming radio and played a game similar to Mario. I set my television's sleep timer and fell asleep to streaming 80's rock music. :) I recommend this to anyone considering a purchase. I haven't even scratched the surface of what I can watch with it. Since I don't need the storage, it works better than the box for me - especially at this price! LOVE  it!
